articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar addresses inspired Afghanistan ahead of crunch Australia clash - ICC Women's World Cup
articles.description: India legend and ICC Global Ambassador Sachin Tendulkar addressed the history-making Afghanistan cricketers ahead of their crucial 2023 ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 clash against Australia.
articles.content:
India legend and ICC Global Ambassador Sachin Tendulkar addressed the history-making Afghanistan cricketers ahead of their crucial 2023 ICC Mens Cricket World Cup 2023 clash against Australia.
